entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -28.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -28.7°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -33.8°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
